Title: The Night Manager
Review: Follows Shaan Sengupta, an ex-soldier, who must infiltrate an arms dealer's inner circle to bring down his empire of war.

Title: The Jengaburu Curse
Review: A London-based analyst returns to Odisha in search of her missing father. Her quest leads to a conspiracy involving bauxite mining, secretly backed by an international nexus, leading to unexplained deaths and a displaced community.

Title: Bro
Review: An arrogant man is given a second chance to fix his mistakes after death.

Title: Farzi
Review: An artist who gets pulled into the murky high stakes of a con job and a fiery task force officer on the mission to rid the country of his menaces in a fast-paced, edgy one-of-a-kind thriller.

Title: Crackdown
Review: A high intensity action-thriller Crackdown 2 starts off with a plane hi-jack. This new turn of events causes grave crisis for the RAW agents where they need to figure who their enemy is, their motivations, and uncover threats.

Title: Jawan
Review: A high-octane action thriller which outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in the society.

Title: Sandeep Bhaiya
Review: A tiffin service provider finds a mentor in a failed UPSC aspirant who inspires her to become an IFS.

Title: 3 Idiots
Review: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Title: Asur: Welcome to Your Dark Side
Review: Shubh returns for revenge and this season he takes the challenge to a whole new level. With the heroes fallen apart, will a desolate Dhananjay Rajpoot and a torn Nikhil Nair be able to stop him?

Title: Satyaprem Ki Katha
Review: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.

Title: Gadar: Ek Prem Katha
Review: During the Partition of India in 1947, a Sikh truck driver falls in love with a Muslim girl belonging to an aristocratic family.

Title: Adipurush
Review: A modern adaptation of the Indian epic Ramayana which follows the exiled prince Raghav's journey to rescue his wife Janaki from the demon king Lankesh.

Title: Dayaa
Review: When a van driver finds a dead body in his truck, he has to take extreme measures to find out the reason behind the death.

Title: Checkmate
Review: An assassin gets hired for a job that throws him in a murky pool of mishaps, eventually leading to a baffling secret.

Title: Por Thozhil
Review: A bright but faint-hearted rookie cop has to overcome his fears in order to succeed in his first case which sees him partnered with a reclusive senior officer to catch a serial killer on the loose.

Title: The Family Man
Review: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

Title: OMG: Oh My God!
Review: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

Title: Maamannan
Review: The community that was exploited by the town's influential man, who completely rules due to the powerful backing of the authorities. A man collects evidence to flip him upside down when he was helpless to stop his endless torture.

Title: Baby
Review: A love story between neighbours and childhood friends played and what happens to their relationship when they go to college and meets a new person.

Title: IB 71
Review: A two- front war between Indian intelligence agencies and the Pakistani establishment.

Title: Commando
Review: When a covert mission in Pakistan goes wrong and his close friend Kshitij is captured, Commando Virat embarks on a perilous journey to rescue him.

Title: Dahaad
Review: Sub-inspector Anjali Bhaati investigates a series of deaths where women are found in public bathrooms. The deaths first appear as suicides but as the investigation progresses, Bhaati realizes that there's a serial killer on the loose.

Title: Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai
Review: A common man with honesty and integrity can take on the system when he has truth on his side.

Title: Choona
Review: When an unlikely group of misfits discovers a common enemy in the same ruthless yet superstitious politician, they plot a heist to exact revenge.

Title: Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story
Review: Set in 1980s and '90s Bombay, it follows the life of Harshad Mehta, a stockbroker who took the stock market to dizzying heights and his catastrophic downfall.

Title: Jai Bhim
Review: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

Title: The Kerala Story
Review: A converted Muslim woman Fatima Ba narrates her ordeal of how she once wanted to become a nurse but was abducted from her home and manipulated by religious vanguards, turned into an ISIS terrorist and landed in Afghanistan jail.

Title: Maaveeran
Review: A cowardly cartoonist starts being 'controlled' by a cartoon action figure, and takes on a corrupt politician.

Title: Pathaan
Review: An Indian agent races against a doomsday clock as a ruthless mercenary, with a bitter vendetta, mounts an apocalyptic attack against the country.

Title: Aspirants
Review: It is the story of the journey of three UPSC (public service competitive exams in India) aspirants and their friendship against all odds.

Title: Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar
Review: Madness ensues when a 'player' in the world of romantic relationships finds a girl who's a worthy opponent, that believes love is a battle of wits.

Title: Half CA
Review: Two CA Aspirants from two different ends of the spectrum of the course, Archie and Niraj embark on the journey of one of the toughest courses and face the obstacles it has to offer.

Title: Dangal
Review: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

Title: Bholaa Shankar
Review: A doting brother tries to hunt down notorious criminals who had harmed his sister.

Title: CAT
Review: A former police informant is forced to become an informant again to save the life of his brother, which forces him to come to terms with his dark past.

Title: Rocket Boys
Review: The story of two extraordinary men, Dr. Homi Jehangir Bhabha and Dr. Vikram Ambalal Sarabhai, who created history while building India's future.

Title: Panchayat
Review: A comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

Title: The Happening
Review: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

Title: Tumbbad
Review: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

Title: Scoop
Review: A journalist's life takes a 360 because of the very system that made her who she is. Will she fight or will she concede?

Title: Scam 2003: The Telgi Story
Review: Born in Khanapur in Karnataka, Telgi became the mastermind behind one of the most ingenious schemes in Indian history that spread across multiple states and shook the entire country.

Title: Chor Nikal Ke Bhaga
Review: A flight attendant and her business partner on a mission to steal diamonds and free themselves from the clutches of a loan shark.At 40,000 feet in the air, the heist goes horribly wrong and turns into a hostage situation.

Title: Trial Period
Review: A working single mother's world turns upside down when her inquisitive son demands a new papa on a 30-day 'Trial Period'.

Title: Brahmastra Part One: Shiva
Review: A DJ with superpowers and his ladylove embark on a mission to protect the Brahmastra, a weapon of enormous energy, from dark forces closing in on them.

Title: Kota Factory
Review: Dedicated to Shrimati SL Loney ji, Shri Irodov ji and Maanniya HC Verma ji, 'Kota Factory' is TVF's latest original. India's first 'Black and White' show highlights the problems present day IIT-JEE aspirants face in their day-to-day lives.

Title: Sweet Kaaram Coffee
Review: Three women of different generations living in the same house, attempt for once, to put themselves ahead of the people they are bound by.

Title: Paatal Lok
Review: A down-and-out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit leads him to 'Paatal Lok' and to shocking discoveries in the four suspects' pasts.

Title: Special OPS
Review: The story through the eyes of Himmat Singh is based on the inspiration was taken from Nineteen Years of nationally significant events, several espionage missions were undertaken by India in the last two decades.

Title: Veerappan
Review: Officer Kannan leads a group of police officers to track down the bandit, Veerappan.

Title: Lust Stories 2
Review: Four eminent Indian directors explore sex, desire and love through short films in this sequel to 2018's Emmy-nominated "Lust Stories".

Title: The Jengaburu Curse
Review: A London-based analyst returns to Odisha in search of her missing father. Her quest leads to a conspiracy involving bauxite mining, secretly backed by an international nexus, leading to unexplained deaths and a displaced community.

Title: Bro
Review: An arrogant man is given a second chance to fix his mistakes after death.

Review: An artist who gets pulled into the murky high stakes of a con job and a fiery task force officer on the mission to rid the country of his menaces in a fast-paced, edgy one-of-a-kind thriller.
